tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE remote_team_members (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE remote_team_members (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_information (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT REFERENCES remote_team_members(id),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    postal_code VARCHAR(10),
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT REFERENCES remote_team_members(id),
    bio TEXT,
    skills TEXT[],
    interests TEXT[],
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE contact_information (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_member_id UUID REFERENCES team_members(id),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    emergency_contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    emergency_contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE work_schedule (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_member_id UUID REFERENCES team_members(id),
    day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);
